tool_description: Processes delivery confirmations including signatures, photos, delivery location verification, and customer acknowledgment.

delivery_location.description: Where package was delivered (front_door, mailbox, office, etc.)

recipient_name.description: Name of person who received package

signature_required.description: Whether signature was required for this delivery

error_messages: Invalid delivery status: Use one of [delivered, attempted, refused, damaged].
Invalid delivery timestamp: Timestamp must be in ISO 8601 format.
Missing signature: Signature was required but not obtained.
Delivery location required: Must specify where package was delivered.
Future delivery timestamp: Delivery timestamp cannot be in the future.
usage: Provide tracking_number, delivery_status, delivery_timestamp, and delivery_location. Optionally include recipient_name, signature details, photo confirmation, and delivery_notes.

proof_of_delivery.description: Type of proof obtained (signature, photo, both, none)
